title: handwritten style
content:
can anyone ID this font? It looks familiar.

comments.content:
never mind I found it. I hate those free fonts, there are so many and are hard to find by normal means - hit/miss. Plus the quality, ugh.

[http://www.dafont.com/font.php?file=tall\_paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604065140/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=tall_paul)
